sentences.en: A fortnight passed in a flash.
A pound of tobacco only lasts him a fortnight.
sentences.cn: 一磅烟丝只够他吸两个礼拜.

sentences.en: Got a job bottle-washing at the brewery. I lasted a fortnight. I couldn't stick it.
sentences.cn: 我找了份在啤酒厂洗瓶子的工作。干了两星期，就再也受不了了。

sentences.en: He had stayed at the pension for a fortnight.
sentences.cn: 他已在那个小旅馆待了两个星期.

sentences.en: He will visit once a fortnight to see how his new staff are progressing.
sentences.cn: 他会每两个星期来访一次，看看他的新员工进展如何。

sentences.en: I really feel in the pink after a fortnight's holiday.
sentences.cn: 度了两星期假后,我的确感到身体非常舒适.

sentences.en: I'm going on holiday for a fortnight.
I've got some leave due to me and I was going to Tasmania for a fortnight.
sentences.cn: 我打算利用应享有的假期去塔斯马尼亚呆两周。

sentences.en: In this quiet way, the first fortnight of her visIt'soon passed away.
sentences.cn: 她开头两个星期的作客生涯,就这样安静地过去了.

sentences.en: Strife was internecine during the next fortnight.
sentences.cn: 在以后两个星期的冲突中我们两败俱伤.

sentences.en: The fortnight at Venice passed quickly and sweetly.
sentences.cn: 在威尼斯的半个月过得很快,很惬意.

sentences.en: They were condemned to spend a fortnight of idleness at that lonely island.
sentences.cn: 他们被迫在那个孤岛上待了两个星期.

sentences.en: This work will tie me up for fortnight.
sentences.cn: 这项工作将使我忙上两个星期.

sentences.en: We arrived safe, at Boston in about a fortnight.
sentences.cn: 两周之后,我们平安到达波士顿.

sentences.en: You need a break. Why not take a fortnight off from work?
sentences.cn: 你需要休息, 为什么不休假两周 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 隔周地；每两星期一次地
